name: Parent Scout
description: Embeds script in ad's parent and sends back parent window information like deviceorientation, size, and scroll.

events.name: recieved_parent_scout_message
events.label: Recieved message from parent scout
events.description: If a parent-scout script was sent out into the parent window scope, it will send back size, scroll, deviceorientation, and devicemotion data. This event catches it and passes the data as the parameter.
